title: Virgin Islands National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Mosquito-Borne Diseases  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Mosquito-Borne Diseases  The mosquito-borne Zika Virus has been confirmed on St. John, St. Thomas, St. Croix and Puerto Rico. People become infected after being bitten by an infected mosquito. more
